name: YouMind
tagline: The first AI creation studio where learning meets writing
description: YouMind helps anyone start creating, from capturing ideas to drafting and polishing articles, podcasts, videos, and more. With YouMind, everyone can turn curiosity into creation.

name: CREAO
tagline: Infinitely personalized software for every team member
description: Teams get stuck with one-size-fits-all SaaS that doesnâ€™t fit anyone perfectly. CREAO lets anyone build custom AI apps with natural language, each one with a built-in copilot. Build the right tools for any job.

name: Empromptu
tagline: Describe your idea to build AI apps that actually work
description: Empromptu empowers businesses to build full-stack, AI-native applications in minutesâ€”no code requiredâ€”by combining a conversational builder with powerful agents that handle data ingestion, logic, and deployment.

name: Ona (formerly Gitpod)
tagline: Sandboxed parallel coding agent platform
description: Your personal team of software engineering agents, sandboxed in ephemeral environments with editing via embedded VS Code and support for desktop IDEs. Collaborate on any device from phone to tablet or laptop.

name: Gram by Speakeasy
tagline: Instantly create MCP servers and SDKs that LLMs understand
description: Gram is an open source platform that enables your team to build MCP servers that perform. Start with your API, add context, refine prompts, and compose custom workflow-based tools until LLMs are executing reliably in production. Start building for free!

name: GoSearch Free
tagline: FREE enterprise search and AI agents for personal resources
description: GoSearch Free is the first agentic enterprise search tool for personal use, expand to a paid plan when ready. Connect your apps to search across files, chats, and emails in one place. Use AI to summarize, analyze, and take action. From the makers of GoLinks.ðŸ”—

name: SAMMY Guides
tagline: Learn any software in real time
description: SAMMY is an invisible AI agent that watches your screen and talks to you in real time. It's like having an expert standing behind you, guiding you step by step as you work or browse.

name: Behold Cam-1
tagline: the clever little wildlife camera
description: Behold Cam-1 is a clever little camera for seeing and sharing your backyard wildlife.

name: Agilepitch
tagline: Superhuman for sales teams on HubSpot
description: Your CRM tells you what happened. Agilepitch tells you what to do next. AI-powered deal execution for HubSpot that keeps every deal healthy and on track.

name: PiÃ±ata Birthday Reminder
tagline: Your simple source of truth for birthdays
description: PiÃ±ata is your simple source of truth for birthdays. Build birthday contacts, get reminders when it matters, and launch your messaging app with a prewritten text message so you can send or call in seconds. Create meaningful moments effortlessly.

name: MiniCPM 4.1
tagline: The on-device model for your personal data
description: MiniCPM 4.1 is a new 8B open-source model designed for the edge. Featuring a novel trainable sparse attention architecture, it brings efficient "deep thinking" and long-context capabilities to on-device AI, achieving state-of-the-art performance for its size.

name: Numbrrrs
tagline: The ios-style calculator that knows you
description: Sleek, private, and a little too honest. Numbrrrs tracks your calc habits, unlocks Easter eggs, and gives you a hilarious yearly Calc'd.

name: Interactive Avatar
tagline: New landing page design, new features includes voice cloning
description: We now have a new landing page and have added even more features. * New central location for storing avatars * Voice cloning area where you can assign your own voices to your avatars * Train your avatar with additional custom knowledge * Full body animations

name: SuperDev Pro
tagline: Raycast built for your browser â€” packed with 16 tools
description: One extension, 16 tools. Inspect CSS, edit text, change fonts, pick colors, extract images, and moreâ€”built for designers & developers on Chrome and Firefox.

name: docAnalyzer.ai
tagline: AI That Works With Your Documents
description: docAnalyzer is your professional AI assistant for document overload and large datasets. Chat with single docs or big projects in any format (including scanned PDFs), automate tasks with AI agents, extract structured data, and collaborate via our Team Plan.

name: Revenuee
tagline: Launch high-converting pages in minutes
description: Meet Revenuee - a sleek Webflow landing page template designed to help your business shine. Build your brand, captivate your audience, and drive clicks with a professional, high-performing design tailored for success. Grow your revenue today!

name: Draiven
tagline: Your AI data analyst in chat form
description: Draiven is an AI-powered analytics assistant that lets you interact with your data using natural language.

name: PogiFit
tagline: Smart nutrition & workout tracker for every level of fitness
description: PogiFit is your ultimate fitness app. Use our calorie and macro counter to reach your goals, with hundreds of personalized gym and home workouts. Download it for free now!

name: Bupple v2.0
tagline: All-in-one AI platform for social media content creation
description: From brainstorming ideas to publishing content, create everything social with Bupple v2.0. Generate a first draft in seconds, then edit it in any details necessary.

name: Optivi AI
tagline: Stay visible in GenAI: track, analyze, optimize
description: Optivi AI helps brands stay visible in GenAI answers. Track mentions, analyze with Brand Visibility Score & Rank Index, and optimize presence with insights, sentiment, and competitor benchmarks. Visibility isnâ€™t luck, itâ€™s engineered.
